snippet.title: Splintered - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
➤ Wishlist Splintered on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3127000/Splintered/
Interested in Splintered? Wishlist now to be notified when the game comes out!

➤ Join the community Discord! https://discord.gg/Jkfh5XxjhU

Splintered is a classic RPG with a major twist: the villain randomizes the world with each defeat! Start with a classic RPG experience, then delve into shifting worlds where the overworld, items, and enemies shuffle, creating new challenges. Conquer these worlds to unravel the story and make your way to the final showdown!

#splintered #indiegame #trailer
